chat_history.message:
Hello,

The package of the order 41171392 could not be delivered because the address is wrong or incomplete.

Please send us the good address + the name of your customer + phone number or ask your customer to reschedule the new delivery with the carrier.

Thank you.


Valérie DECAMPS

Dear ecomobile

The customer has already rescheduled the delivery to a relay point.

Regards,
Damien from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the reschedule. Kindly inform us when the customer has successfully received their package from the relay point. Thank you.

Regards,
JY
